Ik Onkar Satnam Kartaa Purakh Nirbhau Nirvair
One Universal Creator God, The Name Is Truth, Creative Being Personified, Without Fear, Without Hatred.
Akaal Moorat Ajooni Saibhang Gur Prasaad.
Timeless Image, Beyond Birth, Self-Existent, By Guru's Grace.
Chant and meditate. True in the beginning, True throughout the ages.
Hai Bhi Sach, Nanak Hosi Bhi Sach.
True even now, O Nanak, True forever.
